scripts.start: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TS-Compile-Api,Api,Client" -c "blue,red,white"  "npm run build-watch" "npm run start-dev" "npm run start-client"
scripts.startAll: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Docker,TS-Compile-Api,Api,Client" -c "white,blue,red,green" "npm run start-db" "npm run build-watch" "npm run start-dev" "npm run start-client"
